Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Pelovaterin (defensin-like AMP; glycine-rich, UCSS1a; 3S=S, natural AMPs; turtles, reptiles, animals; BBBh2o)

Literature Information.Literature: Pelovaterin exhibits strong antimicrobial activity against two pathogenic gram-negative bacteria, P. aeruginosa and P. vulgaris (J Am Chem Soc. 2008 Apr 9;130(14):4660-8).You can rotate, zoom, and view the 3D structureherein the PDB. Updated 2/2014; 6/2017.
Literature Information.Author: Lakshminarayanan R, Chi-Jin EO, Loh XJ, Kini RM, Valiyaveettil S.2005
Literature Information.Title: Purification and characterization of a vaterite-inducing peptide, pelovaterin, from the eggshells of Pelodiscus sinensis (Chinese soft-shelled turtle).
